description: Example Feature - Template PRD for Ralph

userStories.title: Add field to database
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to store data so it persists.
acceptanceCriteria: Add column to table with appropriate type and default

userStories.title: Display data in UI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the data at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Data is visible on the relevant page
Verify in browser using Playwrighter MCP
